unalcol.types.real.array

Class DoubleArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.types.collection.array.FiboArray
      • unalcol.types.real.array.DoubleArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SortedDoubleArray

    public class DoubleArray
extends unalcol.types.collection.array.FiboArray

    Set of constants and methods operating on an array of the primitive double data type

    Version:
    1.0

      • normalize

        public static void normalize(double[] x)
        Normalizes the array to the interval [0,1] using the sum of the values in the array as the maximum value (precondition: Values in the array should be non negatives and at least one value should be different of zero
        Parameters:
        x - Array to be normalized

      • find

                       double x)

        Parameters:

        x - Element to be located
        Returns:
